channel.title: TOR not connecting when using Whonix GW 16 in vmware workstation
channel.description:
Ok so my nat adapter settings are fine and I can confirm the uplink works in a different machine. TOR is also not blocked since whonix 16 works fine in virtualbox.
However. When using Whonix 16 in vmware and setting the right static ip's and disabling "EXIT_ON_UNSUPPORTED_VIRTUALIZER" Whonix Gateway still does not wan't to connect to TOR for some reason. This worked fine with Whonix 15 and before so what changed?
I'm not sure what's wrong here.
I noticed at least one other person having the same problem in the comment section of this youtube video youtube(.)com/watch?v=2kHrmJoxsJI

So bassically vmware support got completely broken and users who want to use it are told that it doesn’t work?

That makes me a very sad man.

item.source: TOR not connecting when using Whonix GW 16 in vmware workstation

item.title: TOR not connecting when using Whonix GW 16 in vmware workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
My post wasn’t so much to help unfortunately just to notify about the following…

As written on VMware Whonix ™ Support Status… Most important parts…

The status:

Whonix – 31 May 21

Declined Feature Requests

Declined feature requests. Out-of-scope feature suggestions that are not on the Whonix ™ development roadmap.

And if it matters, the rationale for this:

Whonix – 2 Dec 21

Whonix ™ Policy On Non-Freedom Software

Permitted / Prohibited Discussions, Project Philosophy on Non-Freedom Software

Just to shorten your wait… In other words, it’s very unlikely that any help will be provided or this will be resolved.

Not the answer you’re looking for but at least now you now the status of expectations of this have been communicated.

Read full topic
item.source: TOR not connecting when using Whonix GW 16 in vmware workstation

item.title: TOR not connecting when using Whonix GW 16 in vmware workstation
item.dc:creator: gasgeverij
item.description:
Ok so my nat adapter settings are fine and I can confirm the uplink works in a different machine.
TOR is also not blocked since whonix 16 works fine in virtualbox.

However. When using Whonix 16 in vmware and setting the right static ip’s and disabling “EXIT_ON_UNSUPPORTED_VIRTUALIZER”
Whonix Gateway still does not wan’t to connect to TOR for some reason.
This worked fine with Whonix 15 and before so what changed?

I’m not sure what’s wrong here.

I noticed at least one other person having the same problem in the comment section of this youtube video
youtube(.)com/watch?v=2kHrmJoxsJI
